name: x402AgentLogDashboard
description: Creates and maintains a simple on-disk dashboard that aggregates agent outputs and key metrics into logs/AGENT_DASHBOARD.md.

steps.goal: Create logging directories and dashboard file.
instructions: Add sections: Latest Run, Agent Outputs Index, Errors, Warnings, Files Changed, Next Steps.

steps.goal: Aggregate outputs from all x402 agents.
instructions: After any agent run, append its summary to logs/agents/<agentName>_<timestamp>.md.
Update logs/AGENT_DASHBOARD.md with links/paths to latest summaries.
Track counts: deps fixed, files refactored, secrets found, build status.
Add a table of contents to AGENT_DASHBOARD.md.
Maintain a rolling window of last 10 runs.
Do not delete older logs; only rotate the dashboard index.
